column4: I expect a better cd burner app for gnome, anyway. This is too simple.
I've got a question about hdparm.
I don't know why, but hoary don't activate DMA on my CDRW device.
So, I tried to make it with hdparm.
Has you fixed it in some way?
no, I rarely use my cdrw.  When I do, I just re-run /etc/init.d/hdparm start.
But if I forget it, it doesn't burn.
Well, the symptoms are not the same.
What I get is an error dialog saying that my burner is not enable to achieve that speed, or something so
I can drag mp3 files on k3b to make an audio CD.
What do you mean with "not by itself" ?
Just make a new audio CD, and drag mp3 files on the project.
